entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 19 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
